lead_paragraph: The lack of an Olympics or a soccer World Cup deprives 2015 of a single global focus for sports fans but a rich calendar of international events has more than enough world class action to satiate even the most refined palate.

headline.main: No Mega Events but Plenty on the Sporting Menu in 2015
headline.print_headline: No Mega Events but Plenty on the Sporting Menu in 2015

snippet: The lack of an Olympics or a soccer World Cup deprives 2015 of a single global focus for sports fans but a rich calendar of international events has more than enough world class action to satiate even the most refined palate....
